Sentence.value: Palliative care can be given at the same time as treatments meant to cure or treat the disease.
Sentence.pattern_crowdsource: Palliative care can be given at the same time as [[treatments|C0087111]] meant to cure or treat the [[disease|C0012634]].

Sentence.value: Any health care provider can give palliative care.
Sentence.pattern_crowdsource: Any [[health care provider|C0018724]] can give [[palliative care|C0030231]].

Sentence.value: Hospice care begins after treatment of the disease is stopped and when it is clear that the patient is not going to survive the illness.
Sentence.pattern_crowdsource: [[Hospice care|C0085555]] begins after treatment of the [[disease|C0012634]] is stopped and when it is clear that the patient is not going to survive the illness.
